data.title: Hotel Colorado from $130. Glenwood Springs Hotel Deals & Reviews
data.meta_description: Compare prices and find the best deal for the Hotel Colorado in Glenwood Springs (Colorado) on KAYAK. Rates from $130.
data.text:
The Hideaway at Royalton Riviera Cancun provides a vacation oasis only for adults. The resort is an adults-only resort within another resort, truly making it a hideaway for any guests seeking peace and quiet from younger guests. With elevated privacy, high-quality service, and complimentary specialties like afternoon hors d’oeuvres and sunset toasts, adult guests are offered a vacation experience rivaled by none.

Guests at the Hideaway at Royalton are offered private beach areas, adults-only pool spots and sunbathing areas, and in-room amenities like aromatherapy and pillow menus. Guests relaxing at this resort oasis can savor the gourmet cuisine, sip cocktails made with precision and care, and enjoy the endless expanse of a sparkling blue ocean. The best thing is: guests can do as much or as little as they’d like. It’s truly up to them.

Guests will feast their eyes on the eclectic combination of restaurants and bars at the Hideaway resort: there are ten restaurants and 16 bars to choose from. At these restaurants, guests will enjoy local and international gourmet dishes. Have Japanese one night then head across the Pacific Ocean of cuisine to an American style steakhouse the next night: all within the comfort of the resort. This variety of restaurants and bars is unparalleled, and any other resort would struggle to feature such an array of delicious dishes and cocktails. Guests will not leave this resort without a full, satisfied belly, and a nice tan, as well!
